duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage day to day operations of the cyber compliance team.
Build and maintain effective relationships across the organization including with the Legal, Compliance, IT, and business teams.
Partner with internal and external auditors, where required.
Have strong knowledge of security compliance best practices and regulations.
Possess strong written and verbal communication skills.
Continuously look for ways to improve function and manage priorities effectively.
Be an advocate for policy, procedure, and control compliance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Risk Management, or Cyber/Information Security (Master's preferred)
Current Audit, Risk, IT Security, Technology, or Project Management certification
